newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Abacus Direct a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Abacus Direct a buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it began coverage of Abacus Direct Corp, an information provider to catalog marketers, with a buy rating.

-- Abacus owns a database that includes purchasing behavior of some 88 million households, giving it the ability to help catolog sellers target an audience and eliminate names with poor probability for making purchases.
-- Hambrecht expects the company to earn $0.36 a share on $16.9 million in revenue in 1996, rising to $0.50 a share and $24.7 million in revenue for 1997.
